definition: a Malayan dagger with a wavy blade, to become wrinkled or crumpled or creased
details:
noun
- a Malayan dagger with a wavy blade
= synonyms: kris
- a slight depression in the smoothness of a surface
= synonyms: line
- an angular or rounded shape made by folding
= synonyms: flexure
verb
- to become wrinkled or crumpled or creased
= synonyms: wrinkle, crinkle, rumple, crumple
- to scrape gently
= synonyms: graze
- to make wrinkled or creased
= synonyms: furrow
- to make wrinkles or creases on a smooth surface
= example: to make wrinkles or creases on a smooth surface
= synonyms: crisp
